Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde's quest for a fifth AFCON appearance got off to a poor start, as they were thrashed 3-0 at the Cairo International Stadium last Friday.

All three previous meetings between both sides have come on neutral grounds and during championships â€“ the most recent meeting between them ended with Cape Verde securing a 1-0 victory during the 2023 AFCON earlier this year.
Others: The hosts are seeking their first points in this campaign, while the visitors aim to build on their opening-round victory.
Cape Verde are unbeaten in their last four matches on home soil, winning three and drawing one.

Mauritania finally ended a run of five matches without a win when Sidi Bouna Amar came off the bench to score a stunner in the 84th minute, helping them secure a 1-0 victory over Botswana in their opening AFCON qualifying match.
Since then, they have lost to Congo DR and drawn with South Sudan away from home.
